isis.stitle: Recall 03508 Reminder Notice - Tail Pipe Exhaust Single Band Clamp on 9000 Series Models built 11/15/2002 through 3/12/2003 with Caterpillar Engines

recall.subject: Tail Pipe Exhaust Single Band Clamp on 9000 Series Models built 11/15/2002 through 3/12/2003 with Caterpillar Engines

para.exhotlnk: Print ready (PDF file) copy of the dealer letter
Print ready (PDF file) copy of the customer letter

defect.para: THIS IS AN ISIS ONLY NOTIFICATION.
There will be NO Dealer Mailing for this RECALL REMINDER.
Please refer to the dealer letter G-03508 for service instructions.

The single band clamp on the tail pipe can lose its clamping ability under normal driving conditions causing the pipe to loosen and potentially fall off of the vehicle. The pipe could come off without warning and fall into the path of other vehicles on the highway, possibly resulting in a crash without warning.

ownernote.para: This letter is to inform you that the owners of suspect vehicles who have not completed the Recall Service Procedure have been sent a reminder to schedule an appointment to have the service performed.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation regarding this campaign and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
